With a contagious enthusiasm for learning, breaking and creating solutions, I hope to inspire others to get involved with technology.
I am advocate for breaking down silos and challenging red tape. I hope my work will serve as an example and for those looking to make their own impact in the world of technology and security.

I also seem to be rather strong!

As a professional strongwoman, I love competing and using the chance to lift up others in sports and show that weightlifting is for everyone.
My current 2024 achievements are:
